post.body: Not that anyone cares, but I'll be working on an image board type site for ZeroNet.

comment.body: @Inkertus: I figure for the most part like 4chan. I wont require sign in (but may still allow it). I'm thinking that i'll have posts timeout after so long without reply, which will delete them from the network. Once i have a working version, it'll be just /b/. but i'll add more boards afterwords. But considering how small the zeronet population is at the moment, I think one board is plenty.

@Inkertus: I really don't know what i'm aiming for honestly. 4chan, obviously. But i have no real goals. I'm interested in doing this for a few reasons.

- Bored.
- I don't really like the forums that are currently on zero
- I want to see what this network can do.

Other than that, no goals. It will likely go its own way before i'm satisfied with it.
will be at least a few weeks before I have a working copy. 

I will likely have mods elected should that need arise. I'm going to have minimum rules. Obviously no illegal content. Other than that, I don't care.


And I'm not the best person with designing webpages. I'm good with the back end code though, so that should be pretty good.
@Execin: Hmm. I didn't find this through my various google searches. Thanks. I'll look into it.
